title: Psychedelic Foundations
subtitle: Building capacity before going deep
description: Before exploring psychedelics, you need a foundation. This course builds the skills and capacities that make psychedelic experiences safe and meaningful: meditation basics, breathwork fundamentals, nervous system regulation, and the ability to stay present with intensity. Essential preparation before your first experience or before going deeper.

modules.title: Why Foundation Matters
modules.description: The difference between recreation and transformation

modules.title: Meditation Essentials
modules.description: Building the capacity to observe without grasping

modules.title: Breathwork Basics
modules.description: Using breath to shift states and build regulation

modules.title: Nervous System Capacity
modules.description: Expanding your window of tolerance for intensity

modules.title: Staying Present with Difficulty
modules.description: Practice with discomfort before the stakes get high

whatYouLearn: Use breathwork to shift and regulate states
Understand your nervous system and its limits
Build capacity to stay present with intensity
Honestly assess your readiness for deeper work
Know what to work on before going further
requirements: Completed Introduction to Consciousness or equivalent curiosity
